GET /providersÂ¶

List of all supported providers

Example request:

GET /providers
Host: mist.io
Accept: application/json; charset=UTF-8

Example response:

{
  "supported_providers": [
    {
      "provider": "bare_metal",
      "title": "Bare Metal Server"
    },
    {
      "provider": "ec2_ap_northeast",
